typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		SequenceNumber as long,
		Offset as string,
		EnqueuedTimeUtc as string,
		SystemProperties as string,
		Properties as string,
		Body as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: true,
	limit: 100,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	inferDriftedColumnTypes: true) ~> source1
source1 parse(ExteranlNotification = Body ? (Id as string, CommandId as string, NotificationType as string, MessageType as string, TimeStamp as date,  UserId as string, Data as string ) ,
	format: 'json',
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> Parse1
